resources.string: This device plugin can be connected to the HVC-C device.
Connect the microUSB cable and HVC-C that can be powered, make sure that the power light is on.
Set to ON in the Bluetooth settings activity.
To scan the BLE from Android 6.0, now you must have permission of the location information . In order to use this plug-in , please allow the following permissions.

Can not search because the location is disabled.\nPlease enable location by location setting screen.\nAlso, select \'Scanning\' from the menu on the location setting screen and enable \'Bluetooth Scanning\'.
